DOC.brief_summary: Background : There evidence link condition pain modulation ( CPM ) deficiency musculoskeletal pain syndrome fibromyalgia , migraine , tension-type headache irritable bowel syndrome , well temporomandibular disorder , idiopathic facial pain chronic fatigue syndrome . Evidence show pre-surgical situation chronic pain activation CPM . Objectives : The purpose study measure CPM response determine whether neural tensioner exercise patient chronic neck pain effective improvement neck pain intensity , neck disability cervical range motion . Design : Double-blind , randomize placebo clinical trial . Methods : Patients neck pain randomly allocate two group : neural tensionner exercise group ( NTE ) sham technique ( ST ) group . Individuals include study meet follow inclusion criterion : age 18-65 year , neck pain perceive posterior region cervical spine , superior nuchal line first thoracic spinous process 12 week evolution without radicular symptom radiate head . Neck pain intensity visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , neck disability index ( NDI ) , CPM , cervical rang motion measure pre port intervention .
